message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a fair price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being flexible, but I'm looking to spend no more than $100.  Would you be willing to come down to $95?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
Alice, I really appreciate you working with me on this. I'm still only able to go up to $100.  If you can meet me there, we can close the deal.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $108. If you're willing to meet me there, we can close the deal.
